Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Main duty
              
              Provide technical & other supports for projects using Freyssinet products: PT, bridge fittings, stayed cable…:
              

              1/ Develop project:
              
              - Support client, designer on technical product, construction method, offer.
              
              - Study new planned projects.
              
              - Develop relationship with client, designer, consultant.
              

              2/ Follow-up signed projects:
              
              Coordinate with related parties (other internal departments, client, supplier, consultant, designer) to work on Contract, PO, delivery, test, payment and any arising matter.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
